info.name: IJS Vault - Admin APIs
info.description:
Complete API collection for IJS Vault Admin Panel.

## üöÄ Quick Start

1. **Set Environment**: Choose `Production` or `Development` environment
2. **Login**: Use admin credentials to login - tokens are automatically saved
3. **Use APIs**: All endpoints inherit the `{{accessToken}}` automatically

## üîê Authentication

All admin endpoints require `Bearer {{accessToken}}` which is automatically set after login.

**Admin Credentials:**
- Email: `admin@ijsvault.com`
- Password: `Admin@123456`

## üìç Environments

| Environment | Base URL |
|-------------|----------|
| Production | https://ijsvault.codecoytechnologies.live/v1 |
| Development | http://localhost:3001/v1 |

## üìÅ API Sections

- **Authentication**: Admin login with device tracking
- **Dashboard**: Overview statistics
- **User Management**: List, search, filter, suspend, activate users
- **Session Management**: View and terminate user sessions
- **Legal Pages**: Terms of Service, Privacy Policy (HTML content)
- **Notifications**: Send to all or specific users
- **Admin Activity**: Activity timeline and audit logs
- **Settings**: Global settings and plan configuration

## üí° Tips

- Tokens auto-refresh on login
- All admin actions are logged to activity timeline
- Use filters and pagination for large datasets

item.name: Authentication
item.description:
Admin authentication endpoints.

**Admin Credentials:**
- Email: `admin@ijsvault.com`
- Password: `Admin@123456`

**Features:**
- Login with device tracking
- Session creation on login
- JWT-based authentication
- Refresh token rotation

request.description:
**Admin Login**

Authenticate admin user and get access tokens. Creates a session for tracking.

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `email` | string | Yes | Admin email address |
| `password` | string | Yes | Admin password |
| `deviceType` | string | No | Device type for session tracking |
| `deviceName` | string | No | Device name (e.g., 'Admin Panel') |
| `deviceModel` | string | No | Device model (e.g., 'Chrome Browser') |

**deviceType Enum Values:**
- `ANDROID` - Android device
- `IOS` - iOS device
- `WEB` - Web browser (default)
- `HUAWEI` - Huawei device
- `DESKTOP` - Desktop application
- `UNKNOWN` - Unknown device type

**Example Payloads:**

**Web Login:**
```json
{
  "email": "admin@ijsvault.com",
  "password": "Admin@123456",
  "deviceType": "WEB",
  "deviceName": "Admin Panel",
  "deviceModel": "Chrome Browser"
}
```

**Mobile Login:**
```json
{
  "email": "admin@ijsvault.com",
  "password": "Admin@123456",
  "deviceType": "ANDROID",
  "deviceName": "Samsung Galaxy",
  "deviceModel": "SM-G998B"
}
```

**Minimal Login (no device info):**
```json
{
  "email": "admin@ijsvault.com",
  "password": "Admin@123456"
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "user": {
      "id": "admin-id",
      "fullName": "IJS Vault Admin",
      "email": "admin@ijsvault.com",
      "role": "admin",
      "isEmailVerified": true,
      "status": "active"
    },
    "tokens": {
      "access": { "token": "...", "expires": "..." },
      "refresh": { "token": "...", "expires": "..." }
    }
  },
  "message": "Login successful"
}
```

**Error Responses:**
- `401`: Incorrect email or password
- `403`: Account suspended or inactive

**Admin Logout**

Invalidate refresh token, terminate session, and logout.

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `refreshToken` | string | Yes | The refresh token to invalidate |

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": { "loggedOut": true },
  "message": "Logged out successfully"
}
```

**What Happens:**
- Refresh token is removed from database
- Session is terminated
- Token becomes invalid immediately

item.name: Dashboard
item.description:
Dashboard statistics and overview endpoints.

**Features:**
- Total users count with status breakdown
- Active sessions count
- User status distribution
- Sessions by device type

request.description:
**Get Dashboard Statistics**

Retrieve overview statistics for the admin dashboard.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "stats": {
      "totalUsers": 52,
      "activeUsers": 45,
      "inactiveUsers": 5,
      "suspendedUsers": 2,
      "activeSessions": 12,
      "userStatusDistribution": [
        { "status": "active", "count": 45 },
        { "status": "inactive", "count": 5 },
        { "status": "suspended", "count": 2 }
      ],
      "sessionsByDevice": [
        { "device": "WEB", "count": 8 },
        { "device": "ANDROID", "count": 3 },
        { "device": "IOS", "count": 1 }
      ]
    }
  },
  "message": "Dashboard statistics retrieved successfully"
}
```

**Response Fields:**
- `totalUsers`: Total registered users
- `activeUsers`: Users with status 'active'
- `inactiveUsers`: Users with status 'inactive'
- `suspendedUsers`: Users with status 'suspended'
- `activeSessions`: Currently active login sessions
- `userStatusDistribution`: Breakdown by status
- `sessionsByDevice`: Breakdown by device type

item.name: User Management
item.description:
User management endpoints for admin panel.

**Features:**
- List users with pagination, filtering, and search
- View detailed user information with sessions and vault stats
- Update user status (active/inactive/suspended)
- Suspend and activate users
- Logout all user sessions
- Export users data
- Delete users

**User Status Values:**
- `active` - User can login and use the app
- `inactive` - User account is deactivated
- `suspended` - User is banned from the platform

query.description: Filter by status: active, inactive, suspended (optional)

request.description:
**Get Users List**

Retrieve paginated list of users with filtering and search options.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Query Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `page` | number | No | Page number (default: 1) |
| `limit` | number | No | Items per page (default: 10, max: 100) |
| `status` | string | No | Filter by user status |
| `search` | string | No | Search by name or email |
| `sortBy` | string | No | Sort field and order |

**status Enum Values:**
- `active` - Active users
- `inactive` - Inactive users
- `suspended` - Suspended users

**sortBy Format:** `field:order`
- Fields: `createdAt`, `fullName`, `email`, `lastLoginAt`
- Order: `asc` or `desc`
- Example: `createdAt:desc`, `fullName:asc`

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "results": [
      {
        "id": "user-id",
        "fullName": "John Doe",
        "email": "john@example.com",
        "phone": "+1234567890",
        "status": "active",
        "isEmailVerified": true,
        "lastLoginAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z",
        "createdAt": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
        "activeSessions": 2,
        "storageUsed": 5368709120,
        "storageLimit": 16106127360,
        "storageUsedFormatted": "5 GB",
        "storageLimitFormatted": "15 GB",
        "files": 25,
        "folders": 10
      }
    ],
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "totalPages": 5,
    "totalResults": 50
  },
  "message": "Users retrieved successfully"
}
```

```json
      "email": "john@example.com",

      "status": "active",
      "isEmailVerified": true,
      "provider": "local",
      "lastLoginAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z",
      "createdAt": "2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    },
    "sessions": [
      {
        "id": "session-id",
        "deviceType": "WEB",
        "deviceName": "Chrome",
        "browser": "Chrome 120",
        "os": "Windows 10",
        "ipAddress": "192.168.1.1",
        "loginAt": "2026-01-06T10:00:00.000Z",
        "lastActivityAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z"
      }
    ],
    "vaultStats": {
      "files": 25,
      "folders": 10,
      "storageUsed": 5368709120,

      "storageUsedFormatted": "5 GB",
      "storageLimitFormatted": "15 GB"
    },
    "activeSessionCount": 1
  },

```

**Error Responses:**
- `404`: User not found

**Update User Status**

Change a user's account status.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Path Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `userId` | string | Yes | User ID to update |

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `status` | string | Yes | New status value |
| `reason` | string | No | Reason for status change (required for suspended) |

**status Enum Values:**
- `active` - Activate the user account
- `inactive` - Deactivate the user account
- `suspended` - Suspend/ban the user (requires reason)

**Example Payloads:**

**Activate User:**
```json
{
  "status": "active"
}
```

**Deactivate User:**
```json
{
  "status": "inactive",
  "reason": "User requested account deactivation"
}
```

**Suspend User:**
```json
{
  "status": "suspended",
  "reason": "Violation of terms of service"
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "user": {
      "id": "user-id",
      "fullName": "John Doe",
      "status": "active"
    }
  },
  "message": "User status updated successfully"
}
```

**Note:** This action is logged to admin activity timeline.

**Suspend User**

Suspend a user account. Suspended users cannot login.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Path Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `userId` | string | Yes | User ID to suspend |

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `reason` | string | No | Reason for suspension (recommended) |

**Example Payloads:**

**With Reason:**
```json
{
  "reason": "Violation of terms of service - suspicious activity detected"
}
```

**Without Reason:**
```json
{}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "user": {
      "id": "user-id",
      "fullName": "John Doe",
      "status": "suspended",
      "suspensionReason": "Violation of terms of service"
    }
  },
  "message": "User suspended successfully"
}
```

**What Happens:**
- User status set to 'suspended'
- Suspension reason stored
- User cannot login until activated
- Action logged to admin activity

**Activate User**

Activate a suspended or inactive user account.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Path Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `userId` | string | Yes | User ID to activate |

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "user": {
      "id": "user-id",
      "fullName": "John Doe",
      "status": "active"
    }
  },
  "message": "User activated successfully"
}
```

**What Happens:**
- User status set to 'active'
- Suspension reason cleared
- User can login again
- Action logged to admin activity

item.name: Session Management
item.description:
Session management endpoints for monitoring and controlling user sessions.

**Features:**
- View all active sessions across platform
- Filter sessions by user, device type
- Session statistics
- Terminate individual sessions
- **One Device at a Time Policy**: When a user logs in, all previous sessions are automatically terminated
- **Session Validation**: API calls check for active session - terminated sessions cannot make API calls
- **Last Activity Tracking**: Session lastActivityAt is updated on each API call (throttled to 1 minute)

**Device Types:**
- `ANDROID`, `IOS`, `WEB`, `HUAWEI`, `DESKTOP`, `UNKNOWN`

**Termination Reasons:**
- `user_logout` - User logged out
- `admin_terminated` - Admin terminated the session
- `token_expired` - Token expired
- `password_changed` - Password was changed
- `security_concern` - Security issue detected
- `new_login` - User logged in from another device

request.description:
**Get All Active Sessions**

Retrieve paginated list of all active sessions across the platform.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Query Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `page` | number | No | Page number (default: 1) |
| `limit` | number | No | Items per page (default: 10) |
| `deviceType` | string | No | Filter by device type |
| `userId` | string | No | Filter by specific user |

**deviceType Enum Values:**
- `ANDROID` - Android devices
- `IOS` - iOS devices
- `WEB` - Web browsers
- `HUAWEI` - Huawei devices
- `DESKTOP` - Desktop applications
- `UNKNOWN` - Unknown devices

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "results": [
      {
        "id": "session-id",
        "user": {
          "id": "user-id",
          "fullName": "John Doe",
          "email": "john@example.com"
        },
        "deviceType": "WEB",
        "deviceName": "Chrome",
        "deviceModel": "Windows",
        "browser": "Chrome 120",
        "os": "Windows 10",
        "ipAddress": "192.168.1.1",
        "location": {
          "city": "Cape Town",
          "country": "South Africa"
        },
        "loginAt": "2026-01-06T10:00:00.000Z",
        "lastActivityAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z"
      }
    ],
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 10,
    "totalPages": 2,
    "totalResults": 15
  },
  "message": "Sessions retrieved successfully"
}
```

**Terminate Session**

Terminate a specific user session.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Path Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `sessionId` | string | Yes | Session ID to terminate |

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "session": {
      "id": "session-id",
      "isActive": false,
      "terminatedAt": "2026-01-06T12:00:00.000Z",
      "terminatedBy": "admin-id",
      "terminationReason": "admin_action"
    }
  },
  "message": "Session terminated successfully"
}
```

**What Happens:**
- Session marked as inactive
- User logged out from that device
- Refresh token invalidated
- Action logged to admin activity

item.name: Legal Pages

- `privacy_policy` - Privacy Policy
- `cookie_policy` - Cookie Policy

item.name: Notifications
item.description:
Admin notification management for sending notifications to users.

**Features:**
- Send notifications to all users
- Send notifications to specific users
- View sent notifications history
- Notification statistics
- Optional push notification support

**Notification Types:**
- `info` - Informational message
- `warning` - Warning message
- `success` - Success message
- `error` - Error message
- `announcement` - Platform announcement
- `maintenance` - Maintenance notice
- `update` - App update notice

request.description:
**Send Notification to All Users**

Broadcast a notification to all users on the platform.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `title` | string | Yes | Notification title |
| `message` | string | Yes | Notification message |
| `type` | string | No | Notification type (default: info) |
| `sendPush` | boolean | No | Send push notification (default: false) |
| `metadata` | object | No | Additional metadata |

**type Enum Values:**
- `info` - Informational (default)
- `warning` - Warning message
- `success` - Success message
- `error` - Error message
- `announcement` - Platform announcement
- `maintenance` - Maintenance notice
- `update` - App update notice

**Example Payloads:**

**Maintenance Notice:**
```json
{
  "title": "System Maintenance",
  "message": "Scheduled maintenance on Jan 10th, 2-4 AM UTC",
  "type": "maintenance",
  "sendPush": true
}
```

**Announcement:**
```json
{
  "title": "New Feature Released!",
  "message": "Check out our new file sharing features.",
  "type": "announcement",
  "sendPush": true
}
```

**Simple Info (minimal):**
```json
{
  "title": "Welcome",
  "message": "Thanks for using IJS Vault!"
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "notification-id",
    "title": "System Maintenance",
    "type": "maintenance",
    "targetType": "all",
    "recipientCount": 52,
    "sendPush": true,
    "pushSent": true
  },
  "message": "Notification sent to all users successfully"
}
```

request.description:
**Send Notification to Specific Users**

Send a notification to selected users.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Request Body:**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `title` | string | Yes | Notification title |
| `message` | string | Yes | Notification message |
| `userIds` | array | Yes | Array of user IDs (min 1) |
| `type` | string | No | Notification type (default: info) |
| `sendPush` | boolean | No | Send push notification (default: false) |
| `metadata` | object | No | Additional metadata |

**type Enum Values:**
- `info` - Informational (default)
- `warning` - Warning message
- `success` - Success message
- `error` - Error message
- `announcement` - Platform announcement
- `maintenance` - Maintenance notice
- `update` - App update notice

**Example Payloads:**

**Single User:**
```json
{
  "title": "Account Verified",
  "message": "Your account has been verified.",
  "type": "success",
  "userIds": ["695d45ccb30c84001db9e57e"]
}
```

**Multiple Users:**
```json
{
  "title": "Special Offer",
  "message": "You've been selected for a premium trial!",
  "type": "info",
  "userIds": ["user-id-1", "user-id-2", "user-id-3"],
  "sendPush": true
}
```

**Warning to Users:**
```json
{
  "title": "Action Required",
  "message": "Please verify your email to continue.",
  "type": "warning",
  "userIds": ["user-id-1"]
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "id": "notification-id",
    "title": "Account Verified",
    "type": "success",
    "targetType": "specific",
    "recipientCount": 1
  },
  "message": "Notification sent successfully"
}
```

**Get All Notifications**

Retrieve paginated list of sent admin notifications.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Query Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `page` | number | No | Page number (default: 1) |
| `limit` | number | No | Items per page (default: 20, max: 100) |
| `type` | string | No | Filter by notification type |

**type Enum Values:**
- `all` - All types (default)
- `info`, `warning`, `success`, `error`, `announcement`, `maintenance`, `update`

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "results": [
      {
        "id": "notification-id",
        "title": "System Maintenance",
        "message": "Scheduled maintenance...",
        "type": "maintenance",
        "targetType": "all",
        "sentBy": {

        "recipientCount": 52
      }
    ],
    "page": 1,
    "limit": 20,
    "totalPages": 1,
    "totalResults": 5
  },
  "message": "Notifications retrieved successfully"
}
```

**Get Notification by ID**

Retrieve details of a specific notification.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Path Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `notificationId` | string | Yes | Notification ID |

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "notification": {
      "id": "notification-id",

      "targetType": "all",

      "sendPush": true,
      "pushSent": true,

  },
  "message": "Notification retrieved successfully"
}
```

item.name: Admin Activity
item.description:
Admin activity tracking and audit log endpoints.

**Features:**
- View admin activity timeline
- Track all admin actions
- Activity statistics
- Admin profile with recent activity

**Tracked Actions:**
- `user_suspended`, `user_activated`, `user_status_changed`
- `user_deleted`, `users_exported`
- `session_terminated`, `sessions_terminated`
- `legal_page_created`, `legal_page_updated`
- `notification_sent`

request.description:
**Get Activity Timeline**

Retrieve current admin's activity timeline.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Query Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `page` | number | No | Page number (default: 1) |
| `limit` | number | No | Items per page (default: 20) |

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "results": [
      {
        "id": "activity-id",
```

**Get All Admin Activities**

Retrieve all admin activities (from all admins).

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Query Parameters:**

| Parameter | Type | Required | Description |
|-----------|------|----------|-------------|
| `page` | number | No | Page number (default: 1) |
| `limit` | number | No | Items per page (default: 20) |
| `action` | string | No | Filter by action type |

**action Enum Values:**
- `user_suspended` - User suspension actions
- `user_activated` - User activation actions
- `user_status_changed` - Status change actions
- `user_deleted` - User deletion actions
- `users_exported` - User export actions
- `session_terminated` - Single session termination
- `sessions_terminated` - Bulk session termination
- `legal_page_created` - Legal page creation

item.name: Admin Profile
item.description:
Admin profile management endpoints.

**Features:**
- View admin profile with recent activity
- Update admin profile (name, phone, image)
- Activity is logged for audit purposes

request.description:
**Update Admin Profile**

Update the current admin's profile information.

**Authentication:** Required (Admin)

**Request Body (all optional, at least one required):**

| Field | Type | Required | Description |
|-------|------|----------|-------------|
| `fullName` | string | No | Admin's full name (2-100 chars) |
| `phone` | string | No | Phone number |
| `image` | string | No | Profile image URL |

**Example Payloads:**

**Update Name Only:**
```json
{
  "fullName": "John Admin"
}
```

**Update Phone:**
```json
{
  "phone": "+1234567890"
}
```

**Update Image:**
```json
{
  "image": "https://example.com/new-profile.jpg"
}
```

**Full Update:**
```json
{
  "fullName": "John Admin",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "image": "https://example.com/profile.jpg"
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": {
    "profile": {
      "id": "admin-id",
      "fullName": "John Admin",
      "email": "admin@ijsvault.com",
      "phone": "+1234567890",
      "image": "https://example.com/profile.jpg",
      "role": "admin",
      "createdAt": "2026-01-06T17:45:18.223Z",
      "lastLoginAt": "2026-01-06T20:40:13.365Z"
    }
  },
  "message": "Admin profile updated successfully"
}
```

**Note:** This action is logged to admin activity timeline.

request.description:

- `week` - Last 7 days

```json
}
```
